tool_description: NSFW Text Detection API, a cutting-edge tool designed to analyze text content based on its appropriateness. By simply providing a text input or prompt, the API returns two float values between 0 and 1, representing the Safe For Work (SFW) and Not Safe For Work (NSFW) probabilities. Utilizing AI, NSFW Text Detection allows for efficient content moderation, ensuring a safe and professional environment across your platforms.
name: NSFW Text Dection
title: NSFW Text Dection

api_list.name: read_root__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-text-dection.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-text-dection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-text-dection.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-text-dection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
